sentences.en: Alexander held dominion over a vast area.
sentences.cn: 亚历山大曾统治过辽阔的地域.

sentences.en: An equal has no dominion over another equal.
sentences.cn: 平等者之间无支配权可言.

sentences.en: Both begrudge any other kind of dominion held by man over man.
sentences.cn: 两人都抱怨人对人所保有的任何其他形式的统治.

sentences.en: Darkness and Decay and the Red Death held illimitable dominion over all.
sentences.cn: 黑暗之神、腐烂之神和红色死神以不可抗拒的力量统治一切.

sentences.en: I struggled to reason off the nervousness which had dominion over me.
sentences.cn: 我竭力想打消揪住我心头的紧张情绪.

sentences.en: Man has dominion over the natural world.
sentences.cn: 人类拥有对自然界的统治权。

sentences.en: Our country's dominion is very vast.
Sublime is the dominion of the mind over the body.
sentences.cn: 精神对肉体的制约是至高无尚的.

sentences.en: The ancient Romans had dominion over a large part of that area.
sentences.cn: 古代罗马人曾统治过该地区一大部分地方.

sentences.en: The colonists were finally freed from the dominion of the oppressors.
sentences.cn: 殖民地人民终于摆脱了压迫者的统治.

sentences.en: The Republic is a dominion of the Brazilian people.
sentences.cn: 这个共和国是巴西人民的领土。

sentences.en: They truly believe they have dominion over us.
sentences.cn: 他们真的以为他们对我们有统治权。

sentences.en: To him be glory and dominion for ever and ever. Amen.
sentences.cn: 11愿权能归给他,直到永永远远. 阿们.

sentences.en: Toronto - based Dominion Bond Rating Service had to wait 13 years.
sentences.cn: 总部设在多伦多的多美年债券评级服务机构(DOMINIONBONDRATINGSERVICE)一等就是13年.

sentences.en: We seek no dominion over our fellow man.
sentences.cn: 我们不是企图统辖我们的同胞.

words.tran_cn: 占主导地位的；强势的；占统治地位的；[数] 受控的
控制，支配；处于支配地位（dominate的过去式）
控制；支配；占优势；在…中占主要地位

trans.tran_en: the power or right to rule people or control something
